languages.text: "Ты не боишься телесных наказаний, так что будешь дюжину вахт чистить гальюны на офицерской палубе".

traits.locale_text: "Ты не боишься телесных наказаний, так что будешь дюжину вахт чистить гальюны на офицерской палубе".

languages.text: "I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."
languages.original_text: "Ты не боишься телесных наказаний, так что будешь дюжину вахт чистить гальюны на офицерской палубе".

"I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."

languages.text: «Soy consciente de que el castigo corporal es una nimiedad para usted, así que le ordeno limpiar las letrinas de la cubierta de oficiales durante la próxima docena de turnos de guardia».
languages.original_text: "I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."

traits.locale_text: «Soy consciente de que el castigo corporal es una nimiedad para usted, así que le ordeno limpiar las letrinas de la cubierta de oficiales durante la próxima docena de turnos de guardia».

languages.text: 「お前にとって、体罰は些細なものだと知っている。だから、代わりに、次の12ウォッチの間、士官デッキのすべての便所を清掃させよう」
languages.original_text: "I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."

traits.locale_text: 「お前にとって、体罰は些細なものだと知っている。だから、代わりに、次の12ウォッチの間、士官デッキのすべての便所を清掃させよう」

languages.text: “我明白体罚对你来说不值一提，所以我要换个方式。在接下来的十巡里，你要负责打扫军官甲板的所有厕所。”
languages.original_text: "I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."

traits.locale_text: “我明白体罚对你来说不值一提，所以我要换个方式。在接下来的十巡里，你要负责打扫军官甲板的所有厕所。”

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass körperliche Strafe für Euch eine Nichtigkeit wäre. Daher werdet Ihr stattdessen für die nächsten zwölf Wachschichten alle Latrinen auf dem Offiziersdeck putzen."
languages.original_text: "I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass körperliche Strafe für Euch eine Nichtigkeit wäre. Daher werdet Ihr stattdessen für die nächsten zwölf Wachschichten alle Latrinen auf dem Offiziersdeck putzen."

languages.text: « Je sais bien qu'un châtiment corporel vous laisserait parfaitement indifférente. Par conséquent, je vous condamne à récurer toutes les latrines du pont des officiers pendant les douze prochains quarts. »
languages.original_text: "I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais bien qu'un châtiment corporel vous laisserait parfaitement indifférente. Par conséquent, je vous condamne à récurer toutes les latrines du pont des officiers pendant les douze prochains quarts. »

languages.text: "İşkence sana vız gelir tırıs gider, farkındayım. O yüzden bunun yerine önümüzdeki on vardiyada subay güvertesindeki tüm helaları sen temizleyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "I know that corporal punishment would be a trifle to you. So, instead, you are to clean all the latrines on the officers' deck for the next dozen watches."
